description: Health, fitness, medical situations, and lifestyle choices

sentences.english: I exercise three times a week.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du sport' = to exercise. 'Trois fois par semaine' = three times a week.

sentences.english: She has an appointment with the doctor.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir rendez-vous chez' = to have appointment with. Medical appointments.

sentences.english: I feel sick today.
sentences.explanation: 'Se sentir malade' = to feel sick. Reflexive verb for feelings.

sentences.english: He broke his arm in an accident.
sentences.explanation: 'Se casser le bras' = to break one's arm. Reflexive with body parts.

sentences.english: We eat healthy food every day.
sentences.explanation: 'Manger sainement' = to eat healthily. Adverb formation from adjective.

sentences.english: The pharmacy is open until midnight.
sentences.explanation: 'Jusqu'à minuit' = until midnight. Pharmacy hours vocabulary.

sentences.english: I need to take medicine for my headache.
sentences.explanation: 'Prendre un médicament pour' = to take medicine for. Pain expressions.

sentences.english: She goes jogging in the park.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du jogging' = to go jogging. Exercise locations.

sentences.english: I sleep eight hours every night.
sentences.explanation: 'Dormir huit heures' = to sleep eight hours. Sleep duration.

sentences.english: He quit smoking last year.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: a arrêté. 'Arrêter de' + infinitive. Health decisions.

sentences.english: The nurse checks my blood pressure.
sentences.explanation: 'Vérifier la tension artérielle' = to check blood pressure. Medical procedures.

sentences.english: I drink a lot of water daily.
sentences.explanation: 'Boire beaucoup d'eau' = to drink lots of water. Hydration habits.

sentences.english: She practices meditation for stress relief.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer la méditation pour' = to practice meditation for. Stress management.

sentences.english: I have a fever and feel weak.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir de la fièvre' = to have fever. 'Se sentir faible' = to feel weak.

sentences.english: We visit the dentist twice a year.
sentences.explanation: 'Aller chez le dentiste' = to go to dentist. 'Deux fois par an' = twice a year.

sentences.english: He stretches before exercising.
sentences.explanation: 'S'étirer avant de' = to stretch before. Reflexive verb + infinitive.

sentences.english: My back hurts from sitting too long.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir mal au dos' = back hurts. 'À force de' = from/due to (doing).

sentences.english: She eats five fruits and vegetables daily.
sentences.explanation: 'Cinq fruits et légumes par jour' = five fruits and vegetables daily. Nutrition.

sentences.english: I need glasses to read.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir besoin de lunettes pour' = to need glasses to. Vision needs.

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed antibiotics.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: a prescrit. 'Prescrire' = to prescribe. Medical treatment.

sentences.english: I maintain a balanced diet every day.
sentences.explanation: 'Maintenir une alimentation équilibrée' = maintain balanced diet. Healthy eating habits.

sentences.english: She schedules regular medical checkups.
sentences.explanation: 'Programmer des bilans réguliers' = schedule regular checkups. Preventive healthcare.

sentences.english: I avoid processed foods for better health.
sentences.explanation: 'Éviter pour une meilleure santé' = avoid for better health. Dietary choices.

sentences.english: The yoga class starts at 7 AM.
sentences.explanation: 'Le cours commence à 7 heures' = class starts at 7 AM. Exercise scheduling.

sentences.english: We discuss symptoms with the doctor.
sentences.explanation: 'Discuter des symptômes avec' = discuss symptoms with. Medical consultations.

sentences.english: I stretch my muscles after running.
sentences.explanation: 'S'étirer après avoir couru' = stretch after running. Post-exercise care.

sentences.english: She monitors her heart rate during workouts.
sentences.explanation: 'Surveiller son rythme cardiaque' = monitor heart rate. Fitness monitoring.

sentences.english: I take vitamins to boost my immunity.
sentences.explanation: 'Prendre des vitamines pour renforcer' = take vitamins to boost. Immune system support.

sentences.english: The swimming pool opens at 6 AM.
sentences.explanation: 'La piscine ouvre à 6 heures' = pool opens at 6 AM. Facility hours.

sentences.english: I follow a personal trainer's advice.
sentences.explanation: 'Suivre les conseils d'un entraîneur' = follow trainer's advice. Professional guidance.

sentences.english: She practices mindfulness meditation daily.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer la méditation de pleine conscience' = practice mindfulness meditation. Mental wellness.

sentences.english: I wear sunscreen to protect my skin.
sentences.explanation: 'Mettre de la crème solaire pour protéger' = wear sunscreen to protect. Skin protection.

sentences.english: The physiotherapist helps with my recovery.
sentences.explanation: 'Le kinésithérapeute aide à la récupération' = physiotherapist helps with recovery. Rehabilitation.

sentences.english: I count calories to manage my weight.
sentences.explanation: 'Compter les calories pour gérer' = count calories to manage. Weight management.

sentences.english: She feels stressed about work deadlines.
sentences.explanation: 'Se sentir stressé à cause de' = feel stressed because of. Work-related stress.

sentences.english: I need new glasses for reading.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir besoin de nouvelles lunettes pour' = need new glasses for. Vision care.

sentences.english: The gym equipment requires proper maintenance.
sentences.explanation: 'Nécessiter un entretien approprié' = require proper maintenance. Equipment care.

sentences.english: I warm up before intense exercise.
sentences.explanation: 'S'échauffer avant l'exercice intensif' = warm up before intense exercise. Exercise preparation.

sentences.english: She cuts sugar from her diet.
sentences.explanation: 'Supprimer le sucre de son alimentation' = cut sugar from diet. Dietary restrictions.

sentences.english: The mental health counselor provides support.
sentences.explanation: 'Le conseiller fournit du soutien' = counselor provides support. Mental health support.

sentences.english: I track my daily steps with an app.
sentences.explanation: 'Compter ses pas avec une application' = track steps with app. Fitness tracking.

sentences.english: She recovers from surgery gradually.
sentences.explanation: 'Se remettre de l'opération progressivement' = recover from surgery gradually. Post-surgical recovery.

sentences.english: I choose organic vegetables at the market.
sentences.explanation: 'Choisir des légumes bio' = choose organic vegetables. Healthy food choices.

sentences.english: The blood test shows normal results.
sentences.explanation: 'L'analyse de sang montre des résultats' = blood test shows results. Medical testing.

sentences.english: I prefer natural remedies over chemicals.
sentences.explanation: 'Préférer les remèdes naturels aux produits chimiques' = prefer natural remedies over chemicals.

sentences.english: She monitors her blood pressure regularly.
sentences.explanation: 'Surveiller sa tension régulièrement' = monitor blood pressure regularly. Health monitoring.

sentences.english: I limit my screen time before bed.
sentences.explanation: 'Limiter son temps d'écran avant de se coucher' = limit screen time before bed. Sleep hygiene.

sentences.english: The chiropractor adjusts my spine weekly.
sentences.explanation: 'Le chiropracteur ajuste la colonne vertébrale' = chiropractor adjusts spine. Spinal care.

sentences.english: I practice deep breathing for relaxation.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer la respiration profonde pour se détendre' = practice deep breathing to relax.

sentences.english: She joins a support group for motivation.
sentences.explanation: 'Rejoindre un groupe de soutien pour la motivation' = join support group for motivation.

sentences.english: I read nutrition labels carefully before buying.
sentences.explanation: 'Lire les étiquettes attentivement avant d'acheter' = read labels carefully before buying.

sentences.english: The massage therapist relieves muscle tension.
sentences.explanation: 'Le masseur soulage les tensions musculaires' = massage therapist relieves muscle tension.

sentences.english: I maintain good posture while working.
sentences.explanation: 'Maintenir une bonne posture en travaillant' = maintain good posture while working.

sentences.english: She attends weekly therapy sessions.
sentences.explanation: 'Assister à des séances de thérapie hebdomadaires' = attend weekly therapy sessions.

sentences.english: I use essential oils for aromatherapy.
sentences.explanation: 'Utiliser des huiles essentielles pour l'aromathérapie' = use essential oils for aromatherapy.

sentences.english: The health insurance covers preventive care.
sentences.explanation: 'L'assurance maladie couvre les soins préventifs' = health insurance covers preventive care.

sentences.english: I prepare healthy meals for the week.
sentences.explanation: 'Préparer des repas sains pour la semaine' = prepare healthy meals for the week.

sentences.english: She experiences anxiety in crowded places.
sentences.explanation: 'Ressentir de l'anxiété dans les lieux bondés' = experience anxiety in crowded places.

sentences.english: I schedule rest days between workouts.
sentences.explanation: 'Programmer des jours de repos entre les entraînements' = schedule rest days between workouts.

sentences.english: The nutritionist recommends more protein.
sentences.explanation: 'Le nutritionniste recommande plus de protéines' = nutritionist recommends more protein.

sentences.english: I avoid caffeine in the evening.
sentences.explanation: 'Éviter la caféine le soir' = avoid caffeine in the evening. Sleep-friendly habits.

sentences.english: She keeps a food diary to track eating habits.
sentences.explanation: 'Tenir un journal alimentaire pour suivre' = keep food diary to track. Eating awareness.

sentences.english: I practice gratitude for mental wellbeing.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer la gratitude pour le bien-être mental' = practice gratitude for mental wellbeing.

sentences.english: The ergonomic chair supports my back.
sentences.explanation: 'La chaise ergonomique soutient le dos' = ergonomic chair supports back. Workplace health.

sentences.english: I hydrate well before and after exercise.
sentences.explanation: 'S'hydrater avant et après l'exercice' = hydrate before and after exercise. Exercise hydration.

sentences.english: She checks her skin for unusual changes.
sentences.explanation: 'Examiner sa peau pour détecter des changements' = check skin for changes. Skin health monitoring.

sentences.english: I set boundaries to reduce work stress.
sentences.explanation: 'Fixer des limites pour réduire le stress' = set boundaries to reduce stress. Stress management.

sentences.english: The health app tracks my daily activities.
sentences.explanation: 'L'application suit les activités quotidiennes' = app tracks daily activities. Digital health tracking.

sentences.english: I choose stairs instead of elevators.
sentences.explanation: 'Choisir les escaliers plutôt que les ascenseurs' = choose stairs instead of elevators.

sentences.english: She participates in community health programs.
sentences.explanation: 'Participer à des programmes de santé communautaire' = participate in community health programs.

sentences.english: I minimize exposure to environmental toxins.
sentences.explanation: 'Minimiser l'exposition aux toxines environnementales' = minimize exposure to environmental toxins.

sentences.english: The fitness tracker monitors sleep quality.
sentences.explanation: 'Le tracker surveille la qualité du sommeil' = fitness tracker monitors sleep quality.

sentences.english: I practice portion control during meals.
sentences.explanation: 'Pratiquer le contrôle des portions' = practice portion control. Mindful eating.

sentences.english: She seeks second opinions for major treatments.
sentences.explanation: 'Demander un deuxième avis pour les traitements majeurs' = seek second opinions for major treatments.

sentences.english: I avoid processed sugar in my diet.
sentences.explanation: 'Éviter le sucre transformé dans son alimentation' = avoid processed sugar in diet.

sentences.english: The wellness retreat focuses on holistic health.
sentences.explanation: 'Se concentrer sur la santé holistique' = focus on holistic health. Comprehensive wellness.

sentences.english: I incorporate movement throughout my workday.
sentences.explanation: 'Intégrer du mouvement tout au long de la journée' = incorporate movement throughout the day.

sentences.english: She prioritizes mental health over productivity.
sentences.explanation: 'Privilégier la santé mentale plutôt que la productivité' = prioritize mental health over productivity.

sentences.english: I educate myself about nutrition science.
sentences.explanation: 'S'éduquer sur la science de la nutrition' = educate oneself about nutrition science.

sentences.english: The health coach creates personalized plans.
sentences.explanation: 'Le coach crée des plans personnalisés' = health coach creates personalized plans.

sentences.english: I balance work commitments with self-care.
sentences.explanation: 'Équilibrer les engagements avec les soins personnels' = balance commitments with self-care.

sentences.english: She follows evidence-based health practices.
sentences.explanation: 'Suivre des pratiques fondées sur des preuves' = follow evidence-based practices.

sentences.english: I listen to my body's signals carefully.
sentences.explanation: 'Écouter attentivement les signaux de son corps' = listen carefully to body's signals.

sentences.english: The preventive screening detects early problems.
sentences.explanation: 'Le dépistage préventif détecte les problèmes précoces' = preventive screening detects early problems.

sentences.english: I maintain social connections for emotional health.
sentences.explanation: 'Maintenir des connexions sociales pour la santé émotionnelle' = maintain social connections for emotional health.

sentences.english: She adapts her routine based on energy levels.
sentences.explanation: 'Adapter sa routine selon ses niveaux d'énergie' = adapt routine based on energy levels.

sentences.english: I invest in quality sleep equipment.
sentences.explanation: 'Investir dans un équipement de sommeil de qualité' = invest in quality sleep equipment.

sentences.english: The integrative medicine approach combines treatments.
sentences.explanation: 'L'approche de médecine intégrative combine les traitements' = integrative medicine combines treatments.

sentences.english: I celebrate small health victories regularly.
sentences.explanation: 'Célébrer régulièrement les petites victoires santé' = celebrate small health victories regularly.

sentences.english: She advocates for her healthcare needs confidently.
sentences.explanation: 'Défendre ses besoins de santé avec confiance' = advocate for healthcare needs confidently.
